CanadaForestAllometry 0.7.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Package index

All functions

agb_component_proportions()
Boudewyn biomass component proportions (Tables 6–7)
agb_lambert_ung()
Calculate tree-level AGB using Lambert & Ung national biomass equations
get_merch_criteria()
Get merchantability criteria for a jurisdiction/species (BEC-aware for BC)
get_volume_params()
Get volume-model parameters from the CanadaForestAllometry registry
merchcrit
Merchantability criteria
Ung2009()
Ung2009 Growth and Yield Model
v2b()
Convert volume to aboveground biomass components (Boudewyn et al. 2007)
vol()
Calculate tree volume: choose best available model or run all candidate models
volume_model_registry()
Volume model registry
vol_fortin2007()
Estimate tree merchantable volume using Fortin et al. (2007) model (QC)
vol_galbella94()
Estimate tree volume in Saskatchewan using Kozak (1988) form with Gal & Bella (1994) parameters
vol_honer83()
Honer stem volume using DBH and total height
vol_huang94()
Estimate tree volume in Alberta using Kozak (1988) model form with Huang (1994) parameters
vol_klos2007()
Estimate tree volume in Manitoba using Kozak (1988) form with Klos (2004) parameters
vol_kozak94()
Estimate tree volume using Kozak (1994) taper model (BC, BEC-zone specific)
vol_nigh2016()
Calculate tree total and merchantable volume using Nigh (2016) equations (BC)
vol_nl()
Estimate tree volume for Newfoundland
vol_sharma2021()
Sharma (2021) stem volume using DBH and total height
vol_total_to_merchantable()
Convert total volume to merchantable volume (Boudewyn et al. 2007; Appendix 6 / Table 14)
vol_ung2013()
Canadian national taper volume model (Ung et al. 2013)
vol_zakrzewski2013()
Estimate tree volume using Zakrzewski (2013) taper model (Ontario)

Developed by Piotr Tompalski.
